'''MEP: The Way is Shut''' is a jigsaw puzzle in the ''[[Middle-earth Puzzles]]'' series, released in 1997 by [[Iron Crown Enterprises]]. This puzzle uses art originally created for the ''[[Middle-earth Collectible Card Game]]''.
